normalized_poster.payload_xml: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> <featuredAnimalPoster continent="South America"> <animal> <name>Llama</name> <image url="https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/llama-lama-glama-front-machu-picchu-2322843249" /> <description>Sturdy llama stands in thin Andean air, thick wool blocks chill winds, sure-footed hooves grip steep terraces while gentle humming alerts herds to lurking pumas.</description> </animal> </featuredAnimalPoster>
